Funds are available within the Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Army, 21/22, appropriation from PE 0604119A (Army Advanced Component Development & Prototyping) and will be realigned to PE 0603804A (Logistics and Engineering Equipment — Adv Dev) for the proper execution of an FY 2021 congressional increase for the maneuverable lightweight electric weight reducer for proper execution. This is a congressional special interest item. This is base budget funding.
